mapper.select:
select * from product
pro_num like CONCAT('%', #{pro_num}, '%')
AND pro_name like CONCAT('%', #{pro_name}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into product (pro_num, pro_name, pro_unit, pro_price) SELECT CONCAT(SUBSTRING(pro_num, 1, 2), LPAD(max(pro_id) + 1, 6, '0')), #{pro_name}, #{pro_unit}, #{pro_price} FROM product WHERE pro_num LIKE CONCAT('%', 'PR', '%')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, A.* FROM (SELECT * FORM product ORDER BY pro_id desc) A) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
